com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.extensions

Interface ISCUITransactionContextFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISCUISessionAware
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SCUITransactionContextFactory

    public interface ISCUITransactionContextFactory
extends ISCUISessionAware
    All application provided transaction context factory classes need to implement this interface. Single instance of the implementation class will be used for fetching/releasing transaction contexts. asmishra

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISCUITransactionContext createTransactionContext(SCUIContext uiContext)
      This method should return a TransactionContext of type ISCUITransactionContext.
      void init()
      This method will be called once setting this factory as transaction context factory or the factory is initialized during first access.
      void releaseTransactionContext(ISCUITransactionContext transactionContext, SCUIContext uiContext)
      This method can be used to release a transaction context to the pool.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.extensions.ISCUISessionAware

        sessionDestroyed
